entry.title: Anti-arthritic potential of crude sulfated polysaccharide from marine macroalgaeSargassum ilicifolium(Turner) C. Agardh: Regulation of cytokine cascade
entry.summary: Article by Lavanya Ramamoorthi, Srikanth Jeyabalan, Seethalakshmi Sankar, M. Yasmin Begum, Chamundeeswari Duraipandian, Mahendran Sekar, Ling Shing Wong, Vetriselvan Subramaniyan DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/bmc-2022-0050

entry.title: Quest for space: Tenacity of DNA, Protein, and Lipid macromolecules in intracellular crowded environment
entry.summary: Article by Priyanka Phogat, Aparna Bansal, Nishu Nain, Shoaib Khan, Luciano Saso, Shrikant Kukreti DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/bmc-2025-0053
